name: Sightful
description:
SIGHTFUL

SightFul is an Anti-Stealth game where you attempt to lead enemies into traps, killing them while charging the ritual zone and progressing through levels. 

Fall 2021. Part of the Art Center College of Design Entertainment Jam.

Theme: Being Seen 

Total of 6 Levels 

Game Pillars: 

  • WANTING TO BE SEEN 
  • SACRIFICIAL RITUALS
  • TRAPS ARE USEFUL

2D Unity Build: 2020.1.23f1
